text.title: HOW TO INCREASE YOUR INSTAGRAM ENGAGEMENT IN 2025 | Tips, Tricks & Algorithm!
text.p: did you know that growing on instagram
and increasing your engagement are two
completely different strategies i taught
you how to grow on instagram for 2022 in
this video here but today we are talking
about how to increase your engagement
rates what's up everyone it's millie
welcome back to my channel where i post
videos every wednesday teaching you the
latest strategies and trends on social
media to help you grow your brand so
give a little love tab on that subscribe
button to stay up to date on all the
latest tips and tricks i have for you
first i want to say a huge thank you to
this video shout outs i wouldn't be here
if it wasn't for all of you so if you
want a shout out in one of my future
videos be sure to screenshot yourself
watching this and tag me over on
instagram stories or leave a comment
below and subscribe to my channel as
always timestamps will be in the
comments down below because i value your
time and you already know why you're
here so let's get into it if your goal
is to increase engagement you need to
first define which area you're trying to
increase engagement on are you trying to
get more story views more likes and
comments on your in-feed posts or
increase the amount of plays on your
reels which area are you trying to focus
on and don't worry i'm going to cover
all three of those in this video let's
start with stories the first thing you
are going to do is always reference your
insights go to instagram insights open
up your stories section and you can sort
these by the past three months six
months or a year check to see what your
most viewed stories were and equally
important what your least viewed stories
were so full transparency here it's
normal to have your story views be like
a freaking roller coaster all over the
place as you can see in my insights the
my most played stories have five to
seven thousand plays and then my least
played stories have between eight to
nine hundred plays views really just
depend on the day the season what you've
been posting about the holidays all the
things it always fluctuates so when
looking at your insights check to see if
there's a common denominator that
consistently performs well for you and
replicate those things here are the five
tricks i do to increase my story views
when they drop first let your stories
expire sometimes instagram just needs a
little refresh or a reboot anytime i let
my stories expire and then i come back
with something that's really engaging
that's when my story views will soar as
you can see here i was getting between
800 to 900 views this was also right
after my course launch so i was
constantly like selling in my stories
and not a lot of people like salesy
stuff which is fine so my story views
naturally kind of tanked but i waited a
little bit let my stories expire and
then i came back to my stories with
something really engaging and bam story
views went right back up these were two
days apart from each other next use the
stickers instagram has a ton of features
for a reason so that you use them
use their fun stickers to encourage your
audience to engage with your stories my
favorite one to use is the new share
yours sticker which is a fun way to be
interactive with your audience and also
potentially increase your reach to a
wider audience the next thing and when i
keep in mind wanting to increase
engagement naturally let people share
their opinion i like this a little bit
better than having them ask questions
because sometimes we don't know what we
don't know so thinking of questions can
be hard for some people but people
always love sharing their opinions on
something i like having little
competitions around the holidays like
what's the best thanksgiving dish and
having them vote against each other or
the best christmas movie having them
vote against each other having some sort
of way where somebody can share their
opinion give advice all the things
people love that ish next mix it up if
you're in a specific niche and that's
all you're talking about on your stories
change it up talk about something new
stories are where people can connect
with you on a personal level and a lot
of my personal stories that have nothing
to do with instagram which is my niche
those perform really well and then
finally get into people's dms i know
this isn't a story strategy when it
comes to posting but when you open your
instagram and you look at the little
bubbles on top of people that you can
watch their stories instagram's picking
these people because you're close to
them and how do they know that you're
close to these people because you talk a
lot you're probably in the dms with
these people often so if you want your
stories to appear higher on your
followers get into your followers dms
now a quick little nugget for you
something to think about if you have an
account that has the 60 second stories
um is viewer of retention rate if you're
filling up the full 60 seconds and the
video's kinda boring people are probably
going to be skipping past that story
telling instagram that it's not engaging
enough so it won't be pushed out to more
of your followers try to keep your
stories short sweet entertaining and
engaging now why the heck is having a
good engagement rate even important
there are a few reasons but the main one
that i love talking about if you're an
influencer is for collaborations brands
don't look at follower numbers anymore
when trying to find influencers to
partner with they're looking for high
engagement rates because that shows an
authentic follower and a trusting
community if you're wanting to land more
paid brand collaborations my favorite
way to do that is by using third-party
platforms that connect influencers and
brands together one of my top picks for
this is socialbook which is also the
sponsor of today's video socialbook is a
top influencer marketing software for
both brands and influencers they provide
endless social tools for content
creators and brands alike inside of my
social book account i'm able to look at
platform reports because analytics are
important y'all they also have a variety
of growth tools depending on which
platform you're most active on so for
youtube they have thumbnail templates
even for instagram they have graphic
templates another tool i find super
convenient in the platform is the link
one tool where you can build your own
link and bio and of course the get brand
offers section where you can set your
collaboration rates and apply to
collaboration opportunities the reason i
was so excited to partner with
socialbook is because their goal is to
help content creators grow their social
platforms while connecting them to
brands for brand deals because literally
same that's my goal helping influencers
grow and land brand collaborations could
it be a more perfect match here you can
create an account for free using the
link below and start receiving top
paying sponsorship opportunities next
let's talk about how to increase
engagement in your main feed posts
remember your first step is always going
to be checking your insight and this
time we're going to be sorting by post
interactions when you do this you're
able to see your most engaged posts and
your least engaged posts and then use
those as guides for when you start to
create future content after you've
created content that you know your
audience will like because you've
checked your insights this is my posting
strategy for increasing engagement when
i post so before i post i do two things
first i spend 30 minutes commenting on
posts within my industry this can be
going to my competitors profiles and
commenting on their more recent posts
this can also look like going to a few
hashtags that are relevant to my niche
and engaging with those top posts next
i'm going to post a few stories because
this gets people interacting with your
profile hinting to instagram that they
would want to see your post when you do
post and then after i post i do these
three things so i go to yesterday's post
and i heart all of the comments i do
this to kind of pop into people's
notifications let them know that i'm
online hopefully give them a little
reminder that i'm here they can come
back and check out the new post next i
make sure to respond to every new
comment that i get on that post and i'll
spend the following 30 minutes
commenting on people's posts who follow
me so the first 30 minutes before i
posted was all about kind of outreach
and reaching out to people and reaching
out to other posts in my industry and
then the last 30 minutes is
me engaging with my current followers so
i go to my followers and i'm engaging on
their posts i comment on their photos
kind of giving them notifications that
i'm online and the more you engage with
your followers the more instagram will
be like oh these people are connected
let me push her content to them finally
let's talk about instagram reels i have
an entire video talking about instagram
reels mistakes that are hurting your
plays so after watching this video i 100
recommend watching the next one right
here but in general when it comes to
increasing your engagement rate on reels
guess what you're gonna start with your
insights so
i bet you hate that
i know you're probably annoyed with me
saying that at this point but i wouldn't
be a good coach if i didn't tell you to
do it when going to your insights with
reels it's important to ask yourself
what do you want more of do you want
more plays
do you want more engagement more likes
more comments whichever one you want
more of make sure you're sorting your
insights by that thing because sometimes
a video that has a lot of plays it
doesn't really have the best engagement
when it comes to the likes per plays
ratio you know what i mean make sure you
know what you want to get out of it sort
your insights by that thing next some
actual strategies to increase your
engagement rate here would be following
the same steps that i talked about with
my end feed posts so spending time
engaging before and after you post
all the things on top of that you could
do these bonus four things one you want
to make sure you're posting your reels
to your main feed first this guarantees
that your reel will be pushed to your
followers allowing them to build up some
traction and rank you better and explore
next you're going to share your reels to
your stories when someone watches your
reel on your story it does count as a
view but i want to caution you with
doing this like don't overdo it because
then your stories just become like a
walking billboard for your reels and
that's not what people are going to your
stories for often they want that
personal connection so don't overdo that
one or you might scare some people away
lady next create reels that are sharing
unpopular opinions or controversial
opinions some of my best performing
reels are ones that have reached the
haters who completely disagree with
everything i have to say instagram
doesn't know the difference between a
hate comment and a supportive follower
comment they just see it as engagement
and engagement is engagement on
instagram and then finally you can use
other users audios to potentially
increase your reach so when a creator
within your niche posts a real and it's
their original audio use that audio as
fast as you can because their followers
will probably be interested in the same
audio and they'll see your video ranked
under that audio does that make sense
people can use you as an example for
their envision when you get your reel on
a trending audio or an audio that you
know other people will want to be using
in the future naturally other users are
going to go to your reel to see other
examples of videos in that audios to
spark their ideas all the things so it
can increase your reach there if you've
made it this far and you're not already
subscribed to my channel make sure to
hug that subscribe button and turn on
the bell notifications so you don't miss
when i post my next video and i will see
you in the next one thanks so much for
watching follow your joy bye
[Music]
you
